answerText: Joseph Knecht [accept either name][10] This author of The Glass Bead Game also described the friendship of Govinda and Siddhartha, who take different paths to wisdom after meeting Gotama Buddha.

question: Question: This man succeeds Thomas von der Trave after his studies at Waldzell. For 10 points each: [10] Name this man who becomes part of Castalia thanks to his musical gifts and eventually earns the title Magister Ludi after his mastery of the glass bead game.
